query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS time_records (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  employeeId INT NOT NULL,
  clockIn DATETIME NOT NULL,
  clockOut DATETIME,
  hoursWorked DECIMAL(6,2),
  status ENUM('PENDING', 'APPROVED', 'REJECTED') DEFAULT 'PENDING' NOT NULL,
  approvedById INT,
  approvedAt DATETIME,
  updatedById INT,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  KEY idx_time_employee_clockin (employeeId, clockIn),
  KEY idx_time_employee_status (employeeId, status),
  KEY idx_time_clockin (clockIn),
  CONSTRAINT fk_time_employee FOREIGN KEY (employeeId) REFERENCES employees(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS overtime_records (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  employeeId INT NOT NULL,
  timeRecordId INT NOT NULL,
  hoursWorked DECIMAL(6,2) NOT NULL,
  overtimeHours DECIMAL(6,2) NOT NULL,
  multiplier DECIMAL(3,2) NOT NULL,
  type ENUM('50%', '100%', 'NOTURNO') NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('PENDING', 'APPROVED', 'REJECTED') DEFAULT 'PENDING' NOT NULL,
  approvedById INT,
  approvedAt DATETIME,
  updatedById INT,
  notes VARCHAR(500),
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  KEY idx_ot_employee_status (employeeId, status),
  KEY idx_ot_timerecord (timeRecordId),
  KEY idx_ot_type (type),
  KEY idx_ot_employee_created (employeeId, createdAt),
  CONSTRAINT fk_ot_employee FOREIGN KEY (employeeId) REFERENCES employees(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_ot_timerecord FOREIGN KEY (timeRecordId) REFERENCES time_records(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3w6LaRB3GVsYroF.a7cd62c280db --database CGmy49xKQ63PS9N6aZZJgb --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS time_records (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  employeeId INT NOT NULL,
  clockIn DATETIME NOT NULL,
  clockOut DATETIME,
  hoursWorked DECIMAL(6,2),
  status ENUM('PENDING', 'APPROVED', 'REJECTED') DEFAULT 'PENDING' NOT NULL,
  approvedById INT,
  approvedAt DATETIME,
  updatedById INT,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  KEY idx_time_employee_clockin (employeeId, clockIn),
  KEY idx_time_employee_status (employeeId, status),
  KEY idx_time_clockin (clockIn),
  CONSTRAINT fk_time_employee FOREIGN KEY (employeeId) REFERENCES employees(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS overtime_records (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  employeeId INT NOT NULL,
  timeRecordId INT NOT NULL,
  hoursWorked DECIMAL(6,2) NOT NULL,
  overtimeHours DECIMAL(6,2) NOT NULL,
  multiplier DECIMAL(3,2) NOT NULL,
  type ENUM('50%', '100%', 'NOTURNO') NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('PENDING', 'APPROVED', 'REJECTED') DEFAULT 'PENDING' NOT NULL,
  approvedById INT,
  approvedAt DATETIME,
  updatedById INT,
  notes VARCHAR(500),
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  KEY idx_ot_employee_status (employeeId, status),
  KEY idx_ot_timerecord (timeRecordId),
  KEY idx_ot_type (type),
  KEY idx_ot_employee_created (employeeId, createdAt),
  CONSTRAINT fk_ot_employee FOREIGN KEY (employeeId) REFERENCES employees(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_ot_timerecord FOREIGN KEY (timeRecordId) REFERENCES time_records(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
);
